body: I enjoy the subtle details in this one: The lack of color in Makoto's eyes, showing how "lost" she is due to the drugs, Panels 12-14, how her eyes are so red and "dry", indicated that she probably hasn't slept in God knows how long, the look that Sae gives in 12 and 13, showing that she's trying to fight through it, but the drugs are just too much for her. I also enjoy the outfit Makoto's wearing in 12, last one, she was completely nude, this one, she's wearing something, all dolled up, showing that she's dressed for the job. I'm guessing that these are the people either they were sold off to or the men " sampling the products" for the customers. Sae stating that people would be looking for her, but that ain't true, due to them being in Shido's pocket. Makoto's eyes get me the most, how the pupils lack color, how zoned out she looks, how "lost and hopeless" they are, hope there's a part 4.........
The autor has the same name as the protagonist of P5 lmao
